TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Featured by The Guardian

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/ReEiYw"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/12eb8c6b2f48383acdc7484bbc9a5ea5/tumblr_inline_n5zsa0eQX31rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><span>We’re really proud to have been featured by<span class="Apple-converted-space">*</span></span><strong>The Guardian</strong><span><span class="Apple-converted-space">*</span>in a big feature that talks about <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program: Asteroid Redirect Mission</strong></em>, how<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span><strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/NASA" id="js_8" data-hovercard="/ajax/hovercard/page.php?id=54971236771">NASA</a></strong><span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>came to embrace the game and so much more. Take a few minutes and give it a <a href="http://bit.ly/ReEiYw"><strong>READ</strong></a>.</span></p>

<p></p>
